short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to play the game Apple Shooter now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shoot the apple off your friends head using a bow and arrow. Don't miss or you might end up hitting your buddy. Each level positions you further away thus increasing the difficulty.
